duties_responsibilities.duty: Design, develop, and own a machine learning platform serving on-line inferences to over 100 hospitals and thousands of patients.
Combine in-house development and implementation of best-in-breed SaaS solutions to enable platform scalability.
Develop automation tools across the ML development pipeline to increase efficiency and reliability.
Collaborate with the backend team to deliver ML predictions to production.
Collaborate with the data science team on prototyping and developing new data products.
Integrate with the data engineering team to make data available for research.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in a STEM subject (Master's or PhD preferred)
